trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around June 20th 2012
divs: sighting detailshusband and i had just left gym when i had noticed a bright orange\red ball of fire-ish something in the sky. thought it was a plane for a brief second but quickly realized it wasnt that. then noticed it was pulsating but was way too bright to be a star. husband had then noticed others were outdoors looking at the sky and pointing as well. then as quickly as it had appeared, it just dimmed a little and quickly disappeared...completely gone.
Summary: Noticed large round orange ball of fire in night sky
